article_title: Hamas-run health ministry says more than 40,700 killed in Gaza.
sentence: Hamas-run  health  ministry  says  more  than  40,700  killed  in  Gaza.

article_title: Hamas-run health ministry says more than 40,700 killed in Gaza.
sentence: Gaza's  Hamas-run  health  ministry  has  just  released  the  latest  figures  on  the  number  of  people  killed  and  injured  in  the  region  since  7  October.

article_title: Hamas-run health ministry says more than 40,700 killed in Gaza.
sentence: The  ministry  says  40,738  Palestinians  have  been  killed  and  94,154  wounded  since  the  deadly  Hamas  attacks  on  southern  Israel  were  carried  out  last  year.
